plot: A young Iraqi man's dream to play football is destroyed as a result of living in a crime-ridden country, where he must struggle to survive.
title: The Deep
plot_es: A young Iraqi man's dream to play football is destroyed as a result of living in a crime-ridden country, where he must struggle to survive.
plot_en: A young Iraqi man's dream to play football is destroyed as a result of living in a crime-ridden country, where he must struggle to survive.

produce.name: Dubai Media and Entertainment Organisation in association with Dubai Film Market (Enjaaz)
